data.title: Units don't move until end of turn
data.meta_description: This has been really frustrating for me: My units don't actually move when I release the right mouse button, but when I end the turn. (If I tell a unit to automate its movement, it moves during my ...
data.text:
I encountered this too as it is different behavior than Civ 3, but I believe if you have queued movements, it will perform the queued movement right after you hit Next Turn, but they will still count towards the current turns moves. It is to give you a chance to change up a unit's orders before ending the turn.

If you make a command to move during a turn, however, it is executed immediately.
